module.name: sequential_laminate_assembly_design
module.keywords: module, laminate, adjacent, surface, embedded, component, bonding, multi-layer

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the laminate product resulting from the adjacent surface to surface bonding between laminate components. This module also defines the information needed to describe a multi-layer connection in the laminate assembly where the layers are not adjacent.

inscope.li: sequence of application of an embedded component or of material buildup;
support for placement of embedded components;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module with interconnect component, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1643;
items within the scope of application module Component feature, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1657;
items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect module design, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1698.

outscope.li: detailed process description of how to create the bond between multiple laminate components.

ae.refpath: interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal <= interconnect_module_terminal <= shape_aspect {shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition product_definition.name = 'interconnect module'}
physical_component_terminal <= component_terminal <= component_feature <= shape_aspect {shape_aspect shape_aspect.description = 'interconnect module component stratum based terminal'}

aa.refpath: physical_component_terminal <= component_terminal <= component_feature <= shape_aspect shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship.description = 'interconnect module component stratum based terminal definition'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect shape_aspect => interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal

sequential_laminate_passage_based_fabrication_joint <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {shape_aspect.description = 'interconnect module component stratum based terminal'} shape_aspect => component_feature => component_terminal => physical_component_terminal
